description:
This course is about learning the basics of iMovie 10.0.6 and how to successfully edit a video at the end with some fancy features,It also shows some hidden features in iMovie and how to create things outside of iMovie to make your video better

If You Take This Course it will propel your knowledge to the sky about iMovie,You can then use this knowledge on Youtube to edit your own videos and make money out of there,you can become a video editor at home and get money that way,or you can just edit your videos for your own fun

Various skills are involved in this course,it teaches you from how to import videos to how to create a green screened picture via Keynote to make an awesome movie,Combine all the knowledge in the lectures and by the end you would be easily able to make a breathtaking movie

The course contains 7 highly detailed lectures adding up to 30 minutes in total,It is not long for all the information packed into it

The Course is structured from easy to hard level so the easier things are at the beginning and the more complicated things are at the end

You should take this course because if you have a mac and iMovie and you don't know how to use it,then this course will tell you that in high detail and more information on how to make your simple video into a masterpiece
title: Master iMovie 10.0.10 Basics
